duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and engage potential clients through consultative sales techniques, prospecting, and referrals.
Consult with clients to understand their business challenges and propose solutions using Paycor products and services.
Present Paycor products and services to potential clients in person and through telemarketing efforts.
Develop and maintain relationships with referral sources and analyze current client practices to identify sales opportunities.
Meet or exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets, and assist in new client conversion and implementation.
Record and report all sales activities in a timely manner, and support the development of less experienced Sales Executives as needed.
Demonstrate a strong work ethic, regular attendance, and maintain ethical business practices.
